name: URLProtectionSpace
desc: A server or an area on a server, commonly referred to as a realm, that requires authentication.

items.name: init(host: String, port: Int, protocol: String?, realm: String?, authenticationMethod: String?)
items.desc: Creates a protection space object from the given host, port, protocol, realm, and authentication method.

items.name: init(proxyHost: String, port: Int, type: String?, realm: String?, authenticationMethod: String?)
items.desc: Creates a protection space object representing a proxy server.

items.name: var authenticationMethod: String
items.desc: The authentication method used by the receiver.

items.name: var distinguishedNames: [Data]?
items.desc: The acceptable certificate-issuing authorities for client certificate authentication.

items.name: var receivesCredentialSecurely: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the credentials for the protection space can be sent securely.

items.name: var serverTrust: SecTrust?
items.desc: A representation of the server’s SSL transaction state.
